languages.text: "Выдержанный амасек из самых дальних трюмов, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Он в несколько раз старше меня, подумать только! Будто держишь в руках само время, запечатанное в бутылку".

traits.locale_text: "Выдержанный амасек из самых дальних трюмов, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Он в несколько раз старше меня, подумать только! Будто держишь в руках само время, запечатанное в бутылку".
traits.speaker: FW_Lizzy

languages.text: "Aged amasec from the most remote holds, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. To think that it is several times older than me! It's like holding time itself in your hands, sealed inside a bottle."
languages.original_text: "Выдержанный амасек из самых дальних трюмов, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Он в несколько раз старше меня, подумать только! Будто держишь в руках само время, запечатанное в бутылку".

traits.locale_text: "Aged amasec from the most remote holds, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! It's several times older than me, imagine that! It's like holding time itself in your hands, sealed in a bottle."
"Aged amasec from the most remote holds, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! It's several times older than me, imagine that! It's like holding time itself in your hands, sealed in a bottle."
"Aged amasec from the most remote holds, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! It's several times older than me — imagine that! It's like holding time itself in your hands, sealed inside a bottle."
"Aged amasec from the most remote holds, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! It's several times older than me — imagine that! It's like holding time itself in your hands, sealed inside a bottle."
"Aged amasec from the most remote holds, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. To think that it is several times older than me! It's like holding time itself in your hands, sealed inside a bottle."
"Aged amasec from the most remote holds, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. To think that it is several times older than me! It's like holding time itself in your hands, sealed inside a bottle."

languages.text: "Gereifter Amasec aus den besten Fässern, {mf|mein himmlischer Herr|meine himmlische Herrin}. Unglaublich, dass er um ein Vielfaches älter ist als ich! Es ist, als hielte man die Zeit selbst in einer Flasche in der Hand."
languages.original_text: "Aged amasec from the most remote holds, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. To think that it is several times older than me! It's like holding time itself in your hands, sealed inside a bottle."

traits.locale_text: "Gereifter Amasec aus den besten Fässern, {mf|mein himmlischer Herr|meine himmlische Herrin}. Unglaublich, dass er um ein Vielfaches älter ist als ich! Es ist, als hielte man die Zeit selbst in einer Flasche in der Hand."

languages.text: « De l'amasec vieilli dans les cales les plus lointaines, Votre Céleste Seigneurie. Dire qu'il a plusieurs fois mon âge ! J'ai l'impression de tenir une bouteille de temps entre mes mains. »
languages.original_text: "Aged amasec from the most remote holds, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. To think that it is several times older than me! It's like holding time itself in your hands, sealed inside a bottle."

traits.locale_text: « De l'amasec vieilli dans les cales les plus lointaines, Votre Céleste Seigneurie. Dire qu'il a plusieurs fois mon âge ! J'ai l'impression de tenir une bouteille de temps entre mes mains. »

languages.text: 「天の{mf|君|姫}、辺境の奥地から取り寄せた熟成アマセックでございます。これが私より何倍も年上だなんて！まるで時そのものを瓶に封じて、手の中に抱えているような気分です」
languages.original_text: "Aged amasec from the most remote holds, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. To think that it is several times older than me! It's like holding time itself in your hands, sealed inside a bottle."

traits.locale_text: 「天の{mf|君|姫}、辺境の奥地から取り寄せた熟成アマセックでございます。これが私より何倍も年上だなんて！まるで時そのものを瓶に封じて、手の中に抱えているような気分です」

languages.text: «Amasec madurado de las bodegas más remotas, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial. ¡Y pensar que tiene varias veces mi edad! Es como tener el tiempo en mis manos, encerrado en esta botella».
languages.original_text: "Aged amasec from the most remote holds, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. To think that it is several times older than me! It's like holding time itself in your hands, sealed inside a bottle."

traits.locale_text: «Amasec madurado de las bodegas más remotas, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial. ¡Y pensar que tiene varias veces mi edad! Es como tener el tiempo en mis manos, encerrado en esta botella».

languages.text: “这是来自遥远群星的艾玛赛克佳酿，来自上界的大人。想想看，这些酒甚至比我年长好几倍！仿佛将时间本身密封在瓶子里，握在手中一样。”
languages.original_text: "Aged amasec from the most remote holds, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. To think that it is several times older than me! It's like holding time itself in your hands, sealed inside a bottle."

traits.locale_text: “这是来自遥远群星的艾玛赛克佳酿，来自上界的大人。想想看，这些酒甚至比我年长好几倍！仿佛将时间本身密封在瓶子里，握在手中一样。”

languages.text: "Uzak diyarlardan yıllandırılmış amasek, tam da Semavi {mf|Lordumuzun|Leydimizin} damağına layık. Bu şişe benden bile eski. Düşünsenize, sanki zamanı şişeye hapsetmişler gibi."
languages.original_text: "Aged amasec from the most remote holds, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. To think that it is several times older than me! It's like holding time itself in your hands, sealed inside a bottle."

traits.locale_text: "Uzak diyarlardan yıllandırılmış amasek, tam da Semavi {mf|Lordumuzun|Leydimizin} damağına layık. Bu şişe benden bile eski, düşünsenize! Sanki zamanı şişeye hapsetmişler gibi."
